1001.skill_new_description: Tap to fire a missile. Long press to fire bullets.
1001.skill_start_description: Swing your weapon to attack and deal DMG.

1002.skill_new_description: Shoot lasers at the locked target.
1002.skill_start_description: Use the bio weapon to shoot three times in a row.

1003.skill_new_description: Begin to fly while shooting multiple volleys of bullets.
1003.skill_start_description: Starts the acceleration engine and sprints forward, generating a shock wave after landing.

1004.skill_start_description: Flies into the air and swipes at enemies upon hitting the ground, expending all Rage to fire thunderbolts.
1004.affix_effect_skill_desc: Flying costs Rage. If you run out of Rage, your midair swipe skill will activate automatically, and you will fall to the ground.

1005.skill_start_description:
Dodge enemy attacks.
Use Non-mobile Dodge to block and earn Rage. Blocking eliminates all DMG and stuns the enemy.
Long press to keep blocking, which will cost Dodge Energy.

2001.skill_start_description: Swing your weapon to attack and deal DMG.

2002.skill_new_description: You rush forth, damaging enemies you hit.
2002.skill_start_description: You stomp the ground, dealing DMG to enemies.

2003.skill_new_description: Spins her halberd, pulling nearby enemies in front of her and blasting them with bullets.
2003.skill_start_description: You jump into the air and land back where you started, damaging enemies.

2004.skill_start_description: Long press this skill to fire missiles while sprinting.
2004.affix_effect_skill_desc: Gather Rage by running. When Rage is full, you will enter Rampage mode.
